Replace Revolver Bullet Texture: 替换左轮手枪子弹纹理
Switches the revolver bullet texture to: 将左轮手枪子弹纹理切换为已移除的.44 Magnum子弹。
Changes the texture of rifle ammunition: 更改步枪弹药盒的纹理。
Replace Revolver ammunition box texture: 替换左轮手枪弹药盒纹理
Changes the texture of revolver ammuniti: 更改左轮手枪弹药盒的纹理。
Replace Revolver Icon texture: 替换左轮手枪图标纹理
Changes the texture of revolver inventor: 更改左轮手枪库存图标的纹理。
Manufactured arrows can be sharpened to: 制造的箭矢可以被锐化以恢复一些状态。
